enWisdom: When the intention gets corrupted, affliction befalls
Evil intention is a hidden malady
When the intention becomes corrupt, blessings are taken away
Whoever has an evil intention is deprived of his aspiration
One whose goal is evil, his place of arrival [in the Hereafter] will be bad

Wisdom: مَنْ سَاءَ عَزْمُهُ رَجَعَ عَلَيْهِ سَهْمُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever resolves to do evil, his arrow returns to him

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُقَدِّمْ إِخْلَاصَ النِّيَّةِ فِي الطَّاعَاتِ لَمْ يَظْفَرْ بِالْمَثُوبَاتِ
enWisdom: One who does not commence with sincere intention in his obedience [and worship] is not successful in gaining rewards
Corruption of intention is from wretchedness
